title: Strengthening Organizational Development Practical Competencies: Designing Engagement Induction and Leadership Visualization in Online Mathematics Learning

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level subject-matter expertise and problem-solving abilities
context.additional_context: Practical Competency Enhancement Program for Corporate Management/HR Professionals

learning_goals: Learners can distinguish motivational factors (e.g., tutor feedback) from hygiene factors (e.g., clear evaluation criteria) in online projects to establish self-directed learning strategies.
Learners can voluntarily design and execute responsibilities within group projects using leadership visualization tools (flowcharts/role allocation maps).
Learners consistently participate in online math learning, achieving over 85% attendance and weekly project completion rates.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
